divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting out of my vehicle and was talking to another person at saw this thing shaped like a boomerang with very faint lights almost couldnt see it..it was seen because of the contrail it left but not like anything i ever seen. It looked as if it was cloaking. It completely blacked out the sky where it was. Thats how you could see its movement. And after about 6 it was gone like it fliped a switch ..it was headed north west..i called my buddy to tell my story and he fliped out because he was looking at the same thing..very crazy never thought of ever making a report but it was to real
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lindenwold
There were no other sightings in Lindenwold on or around March 14th 2012
Summary: boomerang shape huge in size very faint lights
